idea: We are a Revenue Cycle Management company which provides lots of solutions like Credentialing, Patient Eligibility Verification, Medical Coding, Claims Billing, Denial Management and Payment posting to physicians located in United States and we help them to increase their revenue, US Healthcare is a very vast industry still there are lot of loopholes in the industry which affects physicians so we are here to revolutionise US Healthcare Industry by providing RCM Automation, Intelligence and modern analytics and want to help each and every physician to give services to patient without any kind of stress on their revenue

idea: Welldercare is India's most advanced end-to-end platform addressing the entire spectrum of later life living. Covering every need from life empowerment programs that help regain newfound purpose for higher growth, to cutting-edge globally-acclaimed award-winning futuristic technology that prevents & detects falls and monitors all vital health parameters non-intrusively.
name: WELLDERLY CARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
NOTO is a disruptive D2C healthy dessert brand focused on addressing key gaps in guilt-free indulgence.

India has a large sweet tooth; however, consumers are moving towards ‘permissible indulgences’ and wish to strike a balance between health and desserts, especially after COVID-19.

NOTO was launched in 2019 with a vision to provide customers smarter options to cure their sweet cravings. NOTO has lower calorie, lower sugar, no sugar, high protein, plant based, diabetic friendly ice creams, frozen desserts, ice candies & flavoured syrups which can be consumed instead of the alternatives presently available that are laden with sugar, fillers & dodgy labelling. We believe in being transparent with our customers. All this while ensuring zero compromise on the taste and texture of the dessert.

NOTO’s product range includes ice creams, and popsicles in a variety of global as well as Indian flavours.

We have created direct employment for over 80 individuals and indirectly to hundreds more.

NOTO now has a presence is 4 cities (Delhi NCR, Bengaluru, Mumbai & Pune) with 50 Swiggy Zomato “Dark Stores”. Our ice cream is a pre packaged product manufactured at a plant in Mumbai. We are also sold at over 75 retail stores in Mumbai. In addition NOTO sells its ice creams via its own Website eatnoto.com and is also available on online grocers such as Big Basket & Swiggy Instamart.

In a short span of time NOTO has been able to win the hearts of tens of thousands of customers with its unique product offerings, customer first approach & strong online distribution
name: KAVV FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Filling Station is a start-up platform through its website offering tasty and healthy snacks to the customers which are free from preservatives and sugar and consists of ingredients which are specially selected to offer customer wholesome nutrition intake for improving their health condition and make them live longer with complete fitness. All of these sweets are prepared using either Dates or Jaggery. We do not use any artificial sweetener. In contrast to the myth, these Sweets are equally tasty comparing to sweets with Sugar.
name: MELIORATE FOODS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Cosmoculture aims to start as a “local” grocery delivering company in these cities within 15

mins approximately, reasons for the same being: Collaborating with the local stores could

make the inventory process handling easy in the beginning. Also tying up with these types

of stores could possibly result in more sales, as the consumers in these areas trust their

local vendors and also these stores could work as a good marketing source. In all the

surveys I have physically done in these types of cities, people lack trust on the online

system but if we are collaborated WITH LOCAL VENDORS, it could help us overcome the

same. Even through one of my personal surveys where a shopkeeper has opened a new

store, searches for new customers, and have questions like: what will customer purchase

more, and things like that which we can easily get by studying customers buying pattern

over the course of few months. Then pulling heavy discount of those particular categories

could give us a higher peak.
name: Cosmoculture

idea:
We introduce ourselves as Innovinc Aspire Infratech Solutions Private Limited. We undertake the start to finish Road Toll Construction Turnkey Projects, including design, canopy construction and road furniture. We design as per the client’s specified requirements offering valuable inputs such as lateral wind load, span, width, allowable deflections and allowable stress as per IS Standards.

 

We also provide complete road furniture solutions like thermoplastic paint, MBCB, Kerb casting and painting, signboards, etc. Our qualified team will assist you every step of the way, right from design and specification to the final bidding.
name: INNOVINC ASPIRE INFRATECH SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
